intro: Barkhausia hieracioides, commonly known as the silverleaf daisy, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its silvery-gray foliage and daisy-like yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. Its leaves are narrow and covered in a fine layer of white hairs, which give it a distinctive appearance. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive flowers and drought-resistant nature.
